meta.title: pulsardata.ai | Enterprise Agentic Systems Architecture — MCP, A2A, Multi-Agent Orchestration
meta.description: We architect and deploy production-grade agentic systems for the enterprise. MCP, A2A, multi-agent orchestration, structured outputs, enterprise integration. Not slides — running systems.
meta.ogDescription: Production-grade agentic systems for the enterprise. Architecture, implementation, integration. Senior architects, concrete deliverables, zero fluff.

hero.title: Enterprise Agentic Systems Architecture
hero.subtitle: We design, build, and operate multi-agent systems that run inside your enterprise — not alongside it. MCP-native tool integration, A2A coordination, structured outputs, production-grade guardrails. From architecture decision records to running code.

items.title: Multi-Agent Orchestration
items.description: ReAct, Plan-and-Execute, reflection loops, hierarchical delegation. We select and implement the right agentic pattern for your problem — not the one that demos well. MCP for tool integration, A2A for agent coordination, structured outputs for deterministic downstream consumption.

items.title: Enterprise Integration, Not Disruption
items.description: Your agents must talk to Salesforce, SAP, ServiceNow, and that internal REST API from 2014. We build MCP servers that expose your existing systems as first-class agent tools — with auth, rate limiting, schema validation, and circuit breakers. No rip-and-replace.

items.title: Compliance as Architecture
items.description: EU AI Act risk classification, GDPR data flows, DORA operational resilience — baked into the system design from day zero. Human-in-the-loop checkpoints, audit trails, and explainability are architectural decisions, not afterthoughts.

items.title: Every engagement ships artifacts
items.description: C4 architecture diagrams, Architecture Decision Records, integration contracts, and working code. Every week. If it is not in a repo or a versioned document, it did not happen.

items.title: Enterprise-hardened by default
items.description: 18+ years designing systems that pass architecture review boards, penetration tests, and compliance audits at scale. Our agentic architectures inherit that discipline — security boundaries, least-privilege tool access, prompt injection defense, and observability from the first commit.

items.title: Architects who write code
items.description: No handoff to an offshore team. The person who designs the agent topology is the same person who implements the LangGraph state machine, writes the MCP server, and debugs the token budget at 2am. Senior practitioners only.

useCases.title: Where this matters
useCases.subtitle: Technically demanding environments where agents must be correct, not just impressive.

items.title: Automated technical quotation engine
items.description: Plan-and-Execute agent that decomposes complex RFQs, queries BOM databases via MCP tools, applies regulatory constraint checks (ITAR, EAR), cross-references supplier history, and assembles structured quotes — with human approval gates at each cost threshold.

items.title: Cross-brand data compliance automation
items.description: Multi-agent system with dedicated agents per brand entity, coordinated via A2A protocol, performing continuous GDPR consent verification, cross-brand data flow mapping, and automated remediation — with full lineage tracking for DPO audit response.

items.title: Agentic CRM augmentation
items.description: Agents integrated via Salesforce MCP connectors performing real-time lead scoring, multi-source enrichment (LinkedIn, D&B, internal signals), and next-best-action recommendation with structured outputs consumed directly by Sales Cloud flows.

items.title: Regulated document generation and verification
items.description: Reflection-pattern agents that generate FDA/EMA-compliant documentation, run multi-pass self-verification against regulatory templates, produce diff-level traceability logs, and enforce mandatory human review before submission — zero hallucination tolerance by design.

items.title: Compliant conversational automation
items.description: Hierarchical agent system with ReAct-based routing, structured escalation policies, real-time compliance boundary enforcement (DORA, MiFID II), conversation state persistence, and deterministic fallback paths. Every response auditable, every decision logged.

items.title: Agentic data mesh governance
items.description: Autonomous agents for metadata cataloging, lineage graph construction, and data quality scoring — integrated with your existing data platform via MCP. Agents propose remediation, humans approve. Progressive automation with observable confidence metrics.

cta.title: Two ways to start
cta.subtitle: Both begin with a technical conversation, not a sales pitch.

audit.title: 30-minute architecture review
audit.description: A focused technical session with a senior architect. Bring your use case, your constraints, your current stack. You leave with a concrete assessment — not a proposal to do an assessment.

whitepaper.title: Architecture reference guide
whitepaper.description: "Enterprise Agentic Systems Architecture" — orchestration patterns, MCP/A2A integration blueprints, anti-patterns we have seen in production, and decision frameworks for choosing the right approach.

meta.title: Services | pulsardata.ai
meta.description: Agentic systems architecture, POC-to-production implementation, strategic audit, and Salesforce AI integration. Precise deliverables, senior practitioners.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Precise scope, concrete deliverables, no ambiguity.

items.title: Agentic Systems Architecture
items.what: Full architectural design of your multi-agent system. We define the agent topology (single, hierarchical, mesh), select orchestration patterns (ReAct, Plan-and-Execute, reflection), design MCP tool schemas for your enterprise systems, specify A2A coordination protocols, and document every decision with ADRs. Output is an architecture you can build from — or that we build for you.
deliverables: C4 architecture (context, container, component, code)
Agent specifications: roles, tools, memory, boundaries
MCP server contracts and tool schemas
Architecture Decision Records (ADRs)
Security threat model and mitigation plan
Integration sequence diagrams and data flow maps

items.title: POC to Production
items.what: We implement the agentic system — from a scoped proof-of-concept to full production deployment. LangGraph state machines, MCP server development, structured output pipelines, vector store configuration, observability instrumentation (LangSmith, Phoenix). Sprint-based delivery with working software at each iteration.
deliverables: Functional POC with defined success metrics
Production codebase (typed, tested, documented)
MCP servers for enterprise system integration
CI/CD pipeline with agent-specific test harnesses
Observability dashboards (traces, latency, cost, quality)
Runbooks and knowledge transfer sessions
items.format: POC: 4 to 6 weeks / Production: 2 to 6 months

items.title: Agentic Strategy & Maturity Audit
items.what: Systematic assessment of your organization's readiness for agentic systems. We map your IS landscape, identify high-leverage use cases ranked by feasibility and ROI, assess data readiness, evaluate regulatory exposure (EU AI Act, GDPR, sector-specific), and deliver a phased implementation roadmap with realistic effort estimates.
deliverables: Agentic maturity assessment with scoring framework
Use case portfolio ranked by ROI and feasibility
EU AI Act risk classification per use case
Technical readiness gap analysis
Phased roadmap with effort and cost estimates
Executive summary for board-level communication

items.title: Salesforce + Agentic AI Integration
items.what: Deep integration of agentic capabilities into your Salesforce ecosystem. Agentforce configuration, Einstein customization, external LLM orchestration via MCP bridges, augmented Flow development, and CRM data exposure as structured agent tools. We know both sides of this boundary.
deliverables: Salesforce-agent integration architecture
MCP bridge: Salesforce objects as agent tools
Agentforce / Einstein configuration and tuning
Augmented Flow development and testing
End-to-end integration test suite
Technical documentation and team enablement

meta.title: Expertise | pulsardata.ai
meta.description: Rare combination: 18+ years of enterprise systems integration and architecture + deep, hands-on expertise in agentic AI — MCP, A2A, multi-agent orchestration, production deployments.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.subtitle: Enterprise SI depth meets agentic AI mastery. A rare combination.

pascal.name: Pascal Le Clech
pascal.bio: 18+ years architecting enterprise information systems at scale — most recently as Design Authority for an international luxury group, responsible for multi-brand IS architecture, integration governance, and technical standards across 30+ markets. Now applies that same architectural rigor to agentic AI: multi-agent orchestration, MCP-native tool integration, A2A coordination patterns, and production-grade deployment. The rare architect who has lived both sides — enterprise integration complexity and cutting-edge agentic systems.
highlights: Design Authority — international luxury group (30+ markets)
18+ years enterprise IS architecture and integration
Hands-on: LangGraph, MCP, A2A, Anthropic Claude SDK

matthieu.name: Matthieu Le Clech
matthieu.description: Founder and CEO of Pragmatan, a 200+ employee RPO firm and a recognized force in French IT staffing. Brings deep operational expertise in scaling technical organizations, go-to-market strategy, and building high-performance teams in demanding enterprise environments.

meta.title: Approach | pulsardata.ai
meta.description: Four-phase methodology: discovery, architecture, proof-of-concept, production. Every phase produces versioned artifacts. No phase without deliverables.

approach.title: How we work
approach.subtitle: Four phases. Every one produces artifacts you own.

phases.title: Discovery & Scoping
phases.description: Focused technical session to understand your IS landscape, business drivers, data topology, and regulatory constraints. We assess feasibility against your actual stack — not an idealized version of it.

phases.title: Architecture & Design
phases.description: Full system design: agent topology, orchestration patterns, MCP tool schemas, A2A coordination, memory strategy, security boundaries. Documented in C4 with ADRs for every non-trivial decision. Reviewed with your architecture team before a single line of code.

phases.title: Proof-of-Concept
phases.description: Scoped implementation on a representative slice of the problem. Instrumented with observability from day one — we measure latency, cost per invocation, output quality, and failure modes. Data-driven go/no-go, not opinion-driven.
outputs: Deployed POC with defined success criteria

phases.title: Production & Transfer
phases.description: Full implementation, hardened for production: error handling, retry logic, graceful degradation, monitoring, alerting. CI/CD with agent-specific test harnesses. Complete knowledge transfer — your team operates this, not us.

prerequisites.title: Non-negotiable prerequisites
prerequisites.subtitle: We are selective about engagements because failed projects help no one.

items.title: Executive sponsor with authority
items.description: A named decision-maker who can validate architectural directions, resolve cross-team dependencies, and allocate resources without committee cycles.

items.title: Committed budget
items.description: An approved budget proportional to the ambition. We will tell you if your budget and your goals are misaligned — before we start, not after.

items.title: Available technical counterparts
items.description: Business SMEs and technical leads accessible for design workshops, integration coordination, and iterative validation. We build with your team, not around them.

items.title: Data and system access
items.description: Authenticated access to relevant systems and representative data — staging or production. Agents that cannot reach your systems during development will not work in production.

meta.title: Contact | pulsardata.ai
meta.description: Start with a technical conversation. Free architecture review or direct engagement. Response within 24 business hours.

contact.title: Start a conversation
contact.subtitle: Technical depth from the first interaction.
